headline: Is Berkshire Hathaway Poised for More Gains After Years of Strong Returns?
summary: Wondering if Berkshire Hathaway is a bargain or just living up to its legendary reputation? You are not alone, as valuation questions are on many investors’ minds these days. The stock has quietly added 2.0% over the past week and 10.4% so far this year. It has rewarded long-term shareholders with a staggering 113.3% gain over five years. Recent headlines have focused on Berkshire’s continued acquisitions and hefty cash reserves. This underscores its reputation as both a financial fortress...
